verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Choodumu sodaraa devudu entho preminche Ee jagatin priyudaa preminche ee jagatin siluvalo Praanamu narpincha kristu Yesuni pampenu Priyudaa Yesuni pampenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokamuna karudenchi kristu prabhuvu praanamu Baligaanitche priyudaa praanamu baligaanitche Lokapaapamella siluvalo mosi tholaginche shaapamunpriyudaa Tholaginche shaapamun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vinumu sodaraa prabhu Yesu kristuni paraloka Vaartanu priyudaa paraloka vaartanu unnathamaina Paraloka premanu chaatinchu chuntimi Priyudaa chaatinchu chuntimi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesuni neevu kshaminchumani vedu virigina Hrudayamutho priyudaa virigina hrudayamutho Yesuni amoolya rakhta dhaarale kadugunu paapamellapriyudaa Kadugunu paapamella{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapa bhaaramunu mosikoni neevu prayaasa Mondedavaa ? Priyudaa prayaasa mondedavaa ? paapamoppukoni Yesu paadamula chentaku jerumu priyudaa chentaku jerumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gatinchu chunnadi swalpa jeevitamu sheegrahmugaa rammu priyudaa sheegrahmugaa rammu kartha Yesu nandu viswaasamunchi rakshana Pondumu priyudaa rakshana pondumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Krupayaanandamu pavitra premalo bhaagamu pondumu priyudaa bhaagamu pondumu paapa saagaramunu daatincha galadu Yesu rakshakudepriyudaa Yesu rakshakude{/lang-eng}
